section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Button
Represents a button that extends the VirtButton class ButtonT< PIN >EncButton
A class that represents an encoder button EncButtonT< ENCA, ENCB, BTN >Encoder
Encoder device EncoderT< ENCA, ENCB >VirtButtonVirtEncButton
A class representing a virtual encoder button VirtEncoder
A class representing a virtual encoder. This class provides methods to set the encoder's properties, attach_call callback functions for handling encoder events, and poll the encoder for rotation and direction
